title: Three Restaurant Chains, Average Sales Per Restaurant for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1920-1923 (2)--Original Data, 1923-1938. Data Are For Child'S Co., Waldorf System, Inc., And J.R. Thompson Co. Source: Computed By NBER From Total Sales And Numbers Of Restaurants Per Month As Given In Survey Of Current Business, Supplements For 1932, 1936, 1938, And 1940 And Monthly Issues.

This NBER data series m06007b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 6 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter06.html.

NBER Indicator: m06007b
